examples.example: 书架上边整齐地摆放着各种类型的书籍。

translate.english: On the bookshelf are all kinds of books placed neatly.

examples.example: 蓝天的上边飘着朵朵白云，美丽极了。

translate.english: Above the blue sky float many white clouds, extremely beautiful.

examples.example: 山顶上边矗立着一座古老的寺庙，在阳光照耀下显得格外庄严。

translate.english: On the top of the mountain stands an old temple, looking extremely solemn under the sunlight.
